snippet: Experts say Mitt Romney appears to have benefited from an investment technique that has long frustrated Congress.
abstract: Experts say Mitt Romney appears to have benefited from an investment technique that has long frustrated Congress; complex type of tax shelter allows nonprofit institutions and large retirement funds to exploit the advantages of shell companies set up in offshore tax havens by investing money with private equity firms.
lead_paragraph: Experts say Mitt Romney appears to have benefited from an investment technique that has long frustrated Congress.

headline.seo: Romney’s Returns Revive Scrutiny of Offshore Tax Shelters
headline.main: Romney’s Returns Revive Scrutiny of Lawful Offshore Tax Shelters
headline.print_headline: Romney’s Returns Revive Scrutiny Of Lawful Offshore Tax Shelters
